actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title 42, to provide for appropriate reimbursement for certain services provided by non-profit rehabilitation clinics to crippled and aged persons covered by the medicare program.

summary.text: Defines "public provider" for purposes of reimbursement to nonprofit rehabilitation clinics which provide medical services to aged and disabled individuals covered by the Supplementary Medical Insurance program of Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 42, to provide for appropriate reimbursement for certain services provided by non-profit rehabilitation clinics to crippled and aged persons covered by the medicare program.
